page.title: 10Family Get-Togethers
page.content: THE TIMES WHEN PEOPLE GET TOGETHER WITH THEIR FAMILIES ARE.CHRISTMAS, BIRTHDAYS, NEW YEAR, FUNERALS, CRISTENINGS, OR WHEN THEY GO TO CHURCH.OR WHEN THEY WATCH T.V., HOLIDAYS, TRIPS OR WHEN THEY GO TO THE BATHS.SOME PEOPLE GO VISITING WITH THEIR FAMILIES, OR TO GO SHOPPING. FAMILIES GET TOGETHER TO GO ON PICNICS, ON WALKS.LOTS MORE THINGS LIKE WEDDINGS OR JUST TO COME AND SEE THEM.WHERE I LIVE PEOPLE GET TOGETHER OCCASSIONALLY JUST TO SEE EACH OTHER. SOME PEOPLE JUST SEE EACH OTHER NEARLY EVERY DAY.VERY FEW PEOPLE UP WHERE I LIVE DON'T LIKE TO SEE THEIR FAMILIES.I BET EVERYONE WHERE I LIVE LOVES TO SEE THEIR FAMILIES SOME TIME OR ANOTHER.MOST OF MY FAMILY LIVE QUITE CLOSE TO TOGETHER SO I THINK I AM ALRIGHT.SO I'LL BE ABLE TO SEE MINE WHENEVER I WANT. LESLEY JACKSON.
